required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: DIU-QoL. Quality of Life Evaluation in Intrauterine Device Users.
clinical_study.official_title: DIU-QoL. Quality of Life Evaluation in Intrauterine Device Users.

brief_summary.textblock: Knowledge about the impact on quality of life of women initiating IUD in the Spanish population at baseline and after 12 months of use.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Impact on quality of life of women initiating IUD in a Spanish population assessed by questionnaire.

secondary_outcome.measure: Demographic Data (Age, Place of Birth, Level of Education, Employment status, Personal marital situation, etc.) assessed by questionnaire.

intervention.description: Women who initiate the use of an IUD at the time of the study.

study_pop.textblock: Women who starts contraception with an IUD.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18-49 years old female.
- Women who is visited by a gynecology or primary care physician and starts contraception with an IUD/IUS.
- Women that has not used hormonal contraception in any form in the last 3 months.
- Women who have no problems listening, reading or writing.
- Women who gives their written consent to participate in the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women who have contraindications to use IUDs.
- Women with previous experience with IUDs.
- Women who initiates the use of IUDs for other purposes other than contraception.
- Woman who is participating in a clinical trial at the time of initiating the study.
